basics.name: Alexis Couvreur
basics.label: Software Architect Student
basics.summary: French software engineer graduated from Polytech Nice Sophia-Antipolis, passionate about computer engineering since I built my own computer and compiled my first programs. I can't stop searching about DIY to enhance my home made cluster of raspberry pis !

work.summary: DevOps Evangelist : Sharing best practices to setup a project with a CI/CD and monitoring. Lead developper in new project.
highlights: Best practices CI/CD with Jenkins and dynamic agents through Kubernetes provider
Monitoring infrastructures and softwares in real time with Telegraf, InfluxDB, Grafana and Prometheus, Alertmanager.
Cloud architecture studies, PaaS and FaaS
Setup a Kubernetes On-prem with RBAC all security configurations
Setup a Docker Swarm cluster with volume sharing using Convoy, rolling updates
Reverse proxy with Traefik v1.7 and v2.0

work.summary: DevOps Engineer : improvements and harmonization of DevOps tools, study and creation of a continuous integration (CI) and continuous deployment (CD) to be used by all teams.
highlights: Configuration of Jenkins CI/CD tool and customization
Using Jenkins 'salves' for platform specific builds and workload delegation
Google Cloud Platform (GCP) PaaS & IaaS (with GKE) environments study and benchmark
Kubernetes for provisioning dynamic agents to Jenkins

work.summary: Blockchain inside the IoT world : Research about using the blockchain and their smartcontracts with sensor's data and actuator reconfiguration
highlights: Built custom and private Ethereum blockchain using raspberry pi
Created Ethereum smart contract with using solidity dedicated language

work.summary: Designed, developed and published a cross-platform mobile application using Cordova : VaiPharm
highlights: Designed a cross-platform application from scratch
Developed an app with Apache Cordova

education.institution: Université Nice Sophia Antipolis (membre d'Université Côte d'Azur)
